website_summaries.verdict: With a high-quality picture good for both work and play, this model can be used for either gaming or traditional computer use, and this versatility is why it stands out.
pros: Even for users with slight vision problems, the size and clarity of the 1080p picture makes this monitor easily visible

While it makes work more pleasant, the 144 Hz refresh rate and curved screen also make this monitor a good option for gaming because it offers an immersive widescreen experience with no ghosting of game graphics
With both HDMI and VGA inputs, it connects easily to all standard PCs, laptops, and gaming consoles
cons: The built-in speakers are a little quiet, and gamers in particular may require external speakers
